Class PhpTest

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo, IPhpConfigurationMojo, IPhpunitConfigurationMojo, IPhpWalkConfigurationMojo
public final class PhpTest
extends AbstractPhpMojo
implements IPhpunitConfigurationMojo

PHPUnit executes phpunit TestCases and generate SourceFire Reports.

Author:
Christian Wiedemann, Tobias Sarnowski

getResultFolder

public File getResultFolder()
Returns the result folder to put the xml results to.

Returns:
result folder

getTestPostfix

public String getTestPostfix()
Which postfix will be used to find test-cases. The default is "Test" and all php files, ending with Test will be treated as test case files. E.g. Logic1Test.php will be used.

Specified by:
getTestPostfix in interface IPhpunitConfigurationMojo
Returns:
The php test case postfix.

isSkipTests

public boolean isSkipTests()
Set this to "true" to skip running tests, but still compile them. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.

Specified by:
isSkipTests in interface IPhpunitConfigurationMojo
Returns:
true to skip the testing

isTestFailureIgnore

public boolean isTestFailureIgnore()
Set this to "true" to ignore a failure during testing. Its use is NOT RECOMMENDED, but quite convenient on occasion.

Specified by:
isTestFailureIgnore in interface IPhpunitConfigurationMojo
Returns:
true to ignore test failures

isFailIfNoTests

public boolean isFailIfNoTests()
Set this to "true" to cause a failure if there are no tests to run. Defaults to "false".

Specified by:
isFailIfNoTests in interface IPhpunitConfigurationMojo
Returns:
true to fail if there are no tests

getPhpUnitArguments

public String getPhpUnitArguments()
Additional command line arguments for phpunit. Can be used to parse options (for example the --bootstrap file) but should never be used to set the test file or the xml output script.

Specified by:
getPhpUnitArguments in interface IPhpunitConfigurationMojo
Returns:
additional phpunit command line arguments

             throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException,
